summary: A dramatized account of the hidden sexual abuse and scandal that shook the foundation of the Catholic Church, and the characters, events, and policies that brought the abuse and scandal into existence.
cast: Ted Danson|Christopher Plummer|Brian Dennehy|Daniel Baldwin|Ellen Burstyn|Kenneth Welsh|Will Lyman|Wayne Best|Colin Fox|James Aaron Oliver|Jan Rubes|Steven Shaw|Damien Atkins|Hugh Thompson|Aidan Devine|Chris Bauer|Thomas Mitchell|Donald Ewer|Julian Christopher|Peter MacNeill|David Sparrow|Kathleen Laskey|Philip Williams|Joseph Ziegler|Richard Fitzpatrick|Martin Doyle|Conrad Bergschneider|Lucy Filippone|Nikolas Lozzi|Billy Lister|Waneta Storms|Chris Wiggins|Brian Paul|Leah Pinsent|Colleen Williams|Hugh Dillon|Jessica Greco|Ned Vukovic|Munroe Chambers|Alon Nashman|Jude Coffey|Richard Greenblatt|Stephen Bogaert|Victoria Snow|Deborah Grover|Glen Gaston|Daisy White|Bill Lake|Amy Price-Francis|Reg Dreger|Mairtin O'Carrigan|Chris Ratz|Adrian Roberto|Scott Fink|Travis Ryder|Roman Podhora|James Kall|Dan Petronijevic|Jeff White|Paul Hubbard|Rory O'Shea|Burke Lawrence|Abby Zotz|Donald Saunders|Cedric Smith|Ric Reid|Angelo Pedari|Genadijs Dolganovs|Paul Fauteux|Garen Boyajian|Joan Massiah|Christopher Bolton|Michael Rhoades|Mary Pitt|Gordon Jocelyn|Alec Stockwell|Bill Hall|Rodger Barton|Brendan Connor|David Robinson|Matthew Edison|Gary Krawford|Jane Luk|Laura de Carteret|Ian Alden|Alexandra McGrath|Janessa Crimi|Maria Syrgiannis|Kay Hawtrey|Kathryn Haggis|James Gallanders|Della Kirk|Fabia Kirk|Kevin Caudle|Ted Ludzik|Doug McGrath|Christopher Weedon|Jeffrey Weedon
title: Secretos de confesión
